Header: Two More Tamil Youths Get Army Job Opportunities
Content: Two more unemployed Tamil youths of Kilinochchi under the ongoing ‘Recruitment of Tamil Youths to Different Employments’ project of the 57 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) received letters of appointment in the Army’s Directorate of Civil Affairs on Friday (4) after arriving at the 57 Division Headquarters. Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, General Officer Commanding, 57 Division handed over their letters of appointment and wished them good luck on the eve of their departure to specific Army establishments in the Kilinochchi region.
